name: Lightdash
description: Explore and visualise metrics from your dbt cloud project

DBT_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID.description: Project ID from dbt cloud. See https://docs.lightdash.com/get-started/setup-a-dbt-cloud-project

DBT_CLOUD_ENVIRONMENT_ID.description: Environment ID for your development credentials in dbt cloud.

DBT_CLOUD_API_KEY.description: Your personal API Key from dbt cloud
